example.name: Passive
example.text: The sculpture -- tall and gangly, with angular flaps held * precariously in place by tension cords -- looks like a cross between a communications satellite and a homeless shelter scavenged *none*.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: During speed-dating, John scavenged the room for love.
